CustomField.description: Use this area to track things we need to know about a market (stuff like, we have changed partners 4 times, there’s a competitor program, this publisher distributes to prisons).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this area to track things we need to know about a market (stuff like, we have changed partners 4 times, there’s a competitor program, this publisher distributes to prisons).
CustomField.label: Market Notes
